source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, CASE WHEN fld_zone IN ('A', 'A0', 'AE') THEN 'A' WHEN fld_zone = 'VE' THEN 'V' END as fld_zone FROM floodplain_firm2007_v0 WHERE fld_zone IN ('A', 'A0', 'AE') OR fld_zone = 'VE'

meta.description: Effective Flood Insurance Rate Maps (FIRMs) data are available at FEMA Flood Map Service Center
